se.itu.game.cave

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.itu.game.cave.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class for the player functionality of the game. Can navigate through the cave, pick up and drop items.

    • Method Summary

      • describeCurrentRoom

        public java.lang.String describeCurrentRoom()
        Returns the current room description. Also checks for rule text to be concatenated, if one is present.
        Returns:
        a description of the current room

      • dropThing

        public void dropThing(Thing thing)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Drops a thing to the current room and removing it from Player's inventory. Also checks for any room rule when a thing is dropped.
        Parameters:
        thing - the thing to be dropped
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if thing is not present in inventory or null

      • getInstance

        public static Player getInstance()
        Returns the only instance of Player. Initializes the Player with the first room in the cave as argument.
        Returns:
        the only instance of Player

      • go

        public void go(Room.Direction direction)
        throws IllegalMoveException
        Moves the player in given direction
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction in which to move
        Throws:
        IllegalMoveException - - if there is not Room in the given direction

      • hasAllKeys

        public boolean hasAllKeys()
        Returns true if Player's inventory contains all the required keys needed to pick up the Pirate Chest.
        Returns:
        true if Player has all the necessary keys for the pirate chest

      • inventory

        public java.util.List<Thing> inventory()
        Returns a list of Player's things
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable list of things Player's things

      • takeThing

        public void takeThing(Thing thing)
               throws RuleViolationException
        Takes a thing from a room. Checks rules for the given thing, removes the thing from the current room and adds it to Player's inventory. Also checks for any room rule when a thing is taken
        Parameters:
        thing - the thing Player is about to take
        Throws:
        RuleViolationException - if the Thing can't be picked up

      • thingsInCurrentRoom
